title: [PSP] WTF: Work Time Fun [NTSC CSO]
description:
***************************************************************************

                      WTF: Work Time Fun (2006)

***************************************************************************
WTF is a crazy collection of fun and addictive mini-games driving the player 
to perform often trivial, often mind-bending, but always fun, jobs in 
pursuit of the almighty dollar. Spend your well-earned money on new 
jobs/games, tools, trinkets and more. And what do you do when you've 
spent all your money? Get right back to work so you can make more money 
to buy more stuff...sounds a lot like life, doesn't it?

The latest in a long line of unique Japanese games that have gained popularity 
in the US, WTF: work time funÃƒâ€šÃ‚Â¢ delivers gamers addictive, bite-sized morsels 
of crazy arcade-style action unlike anything ever seen on the PSP. It may 
seem silly, but you won't be able to stop playing!

* Test your skills and earn cash with more than 40 whacked-out mini-games.
* Use the money you earn to unlock more games and collect hundreds of unique prizes.
* Unlock useful tools for your PSP like the Bar Calculator, World Clock and more.
* Compete against your friends in hilarious multi-player action.

***************************************************************************
                       Bought from the PS Store,

                       converted to ISO, 

                       deleted the UPDATE folder, 

                       compressed to CSO and

                       tested on 4.01 M33-2. :)
***************************************************************************
